channel.title: database design on STATCOM at ISU
channel.description: Recent content in database design on STATCOM at ISU
channel.copyright: This website lists content related to talks that have either already taken place or scheduled to take place in the STATCOM organization. All rights remain with the organization respective officers.

item.title: Practical Farmers of Iowa
item.description: PFI is a non-profit that works with Iowa farmers. One of the things they do is organize small-scale field trials to study the effects of sustainable agricultural practices. The project requires the following tasks: Automating the extraction of data from 20+ years of badly formatted records. Data cleaning. Database design. Advice on best-practices for collecting and storing data in ways that make it easy to use for future analysis.
